channel.title: Bring Back Regulated Tutorial!
channel.description: Okay, since Mopar upgraded to SMF 2, the tutorial section is no longer regulated and anyone can post new topics. This has to be the one thing that pisses me off most, people leeching tutorials from other sites and posting it with their name on it. Vote to bring back regulated tutorials!

item.title: Bring Back Regulated Tutorial!
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

the staff says no.

Read full topic

item.title: Bring Back Regulated Tutorial!
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

[quote=“lesterknome, post:17, topic:326020”][quote author=Telenim link=topic=422431.msg3101120#msg3101120 date=1263706793]

[quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=422431.msg3101044#msg3101044 date=1263703532]

By encouraging leechers?
[/quote]That’s the way the site was back in the day. Notice how back then servers were creative and actually fun. You don’t see that anymore, do you?

Nope, servers have just gone all out PvP, nothing creative unless its by someone whose been doing servers for quite some time.
[/quote]Back in the day. Of course no one would realize servers were actually creative and fun, because no one from around 2007 comes here anymore

dood remember GS minigame, barrows, allstar pkbox :([/quote]

Us 2009ers prefer economy servers which aim to be runescape replicas, but about 5 years old, unstable and without minigames.

We also force you to sign up to our website to login to your account, and download our own 50mb client to play.

Read full topic

item.title: Bring Back Regulated Tutorial!
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

deathschaos9:

Okay, since Mopar upgraded to SMF 2, the tutorial section is no longer regulated and anyone can post new topics. This has to be the one thing that pisses me off most, people leeching tutorials from other sites and posting it with their name on it. Vote to bring back regulated tutorials!

This gets us new members and is also how we learn

item.title: Bring Back Regulated Tutorial!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

m.dog311:

Are you people happy with anything? When the filter was there you all bitched about tutorials just sitting there waiting to be filtered. Now that it’s gone, you all want the filter back…

Well I never bitched, it was much better as it was. Now theirs a ton of leeched shit that’s doing nothing more than taking up database space.

Read full topic

item.title: Bring Back Regulated Tutorial!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Lin:

No way. I’ve been waiting for it to get like this ever since I heard the forum was going to be upgraded. You have no control over it, and this should be in the site suggestions. Watch, soon servers won’t be so… limited, and tutorials for all sorts of feature-adding content will be added, and servers will be cool again.

I agree with that, but I still think there needs to be some form of regulation, people are leeching off r-s and r-l and not to mention posting things that aren’t even remotely close to being a decent tutorial.

Read full topic
